name: Call of Spoopy: Modern Birdfare
description:
Defend your big pumpkin harvest from the ghouls of the night!

You are a but a simple birb with a witch hat and a wand. Cast spells against the monsters and set as high a score as possible!

Controls:

  • Left/Right Arrow: Cast Spell
  • Escape: Close Fullscreen

Team:

  • Lauren Rakes: Art
  • Robert Desrosiers: Code

Made in 6~8 hours (yeee) for Halloween 2022.
